title: Did Mark Twain say: " It is easier to deceive people than to convince them that they have been deceived? '
subtitle: While the quote "it's easier to fool people than to convince them that they're fooled" is often attributed to Mark Twain, there is no evidence that the author wrote this phrase.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Mark Twain said it was easier to fool people than to convince them that they had been deceived.
